definition: double-edged sword/CL:口[kou3],把[ba3]/classifier for blows of a sword
"knife" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 18)/see also 立刀旁[li4 dao1 pang2]/see also 側刀旁|侧刀旁[ce4 dao1 pang2]
lit. with swords drawn and bows bent (idiom); fig. a state of mutual hostility/at daggers drawn
fight a battle of words/cross verbal swords

sentences.english: The plant has Rapier 80, Availability on 30 meters.
sentences.chinese: 本厂拥有剑杆织机80台，月供货30万米。

sentences.english: At last his rapier flew into the corner of the room.
sentences.chinese: 最后他的剑飞进来了房屋的角落。

sentences.english: The Soul Reaver is a weapon in the Legacy of Kain series.
sentences.chinese: 搜魂剑是凯恩的遗产系列里的一把武器。

sentences.english: My cousin Roran and I, we've trained, with swords!
sentences.chinese: 我表哥罗伦和我都练过剑。

sentences.english: Bending the ear of the hedgerow with stories of fire and sword.
sentences.chinese: 吹压着篱木的耳朵，讲述剑与火的故事。

sentences.english: Then they cut him in two with a sharp sword, and left both halves of his body in the middle of the road.
sentences.chinese: 强盗们用一把锋利的剑把牧师砍成两截留在了路中央。

sentences.english: The sword has sharp blades, and is able to cut anything.
sentences.chinese: 这把剑的剑锋很利，真是削铁如泥。

sentences.english: And we go and we dig up in France and there is the saber,right?
sentences.chinese: 然后我们就去法国，真的挖出了剑？

sentences.english: The sword swallower swallowed a swollen sword.
sentences.chinese: 吞剑人吞了一把膨胀的剑。

sentences.english: A sword is hung above his head.
sentences.chinese: 一枝剑悬挂在他头的上方。

sentences.english: In High Profile, use your Armed button to unsheathe your sword.
sentences.chinese: 在高姿态时，用你的“武装”按键即可拔出你的剑。

sentences.english: They had carried out their robbery with swords, blades and pistols.
sentences.chinese: 他们已经履行了其与剑，刀和手枪抢劫。

sentences.english: Did your husband get the Emperor's sword?
sentences.chinese: 那驸马得到皇帝的剑了么？

sentences.english: Probably she was the woman playing sword in front of the jade!
sentences.chinese: 嗯，多半便是那个在石壁前使剑的女子。

sentences.english: And my sword in the worst fighting has broken.
sentences.chinese: 而我的剑在这次惨烈的战斗中已断。

sentences.english: This was his summing up the spirit of the Liang Jian.
sentences.chinese: 这也是他总结的亮剑精神所在。

definition: handle or shaft (of an axe etc)/(of a flower, leaf or fruit) stem/sth that affords an advantage to an opponent/classifier for knives or blades
halberd/long-handled weapon with pointed tip and crescent blade/combined spear and battle-ax
